headline.main: Olsen Twins Won’t Appear In ‘Full House’ Reboot

snippet: The coming Netflix reboot of “Full House” will move forward without Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen, the twins who took turns playing the cheeky Michelle Tanner.
abstract: The coming Netflix reboot of “Full House” will move forward without Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen, the twins who took turns playing the cheeky Michelle Tanner.
